author: NiclasEich
body:
The BTV@HLT group has developed a dedicated recalibration of the DeepJet tagger for the new trigger paths, mentioned during the [trigger reviews](https://indico.cern.ch/event/1099590/contributions/4626735/attachments/2358514/4025643/03_12_21_BTV_triggerreview.pdf).
After testing by several analysts, the model has found to be ready for deployment (see [BTV-WG meeting](https://indico.cern.ch/event/1112381/contributions/4676573/attachments/2376286/4059284/220120_BTV%40HLT%E2%80%93news.pdf)).

We deployed everything in a dedicated HLT subdirectory for better organization towards the future when more models might be deployed at HLT-level.

@SWuchterl
title: Merge HLT DeepJet models for Run3
